Text: Swapco Agreements Cc legal Tana can you fax me the final executed copies of the following agreements we did this week Employee Access Agreement and Waiver Administrative Services Agreement Software License Agreement Please fax to my attention co conf room A at You can reach me at if you have any questions Thanks NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you

name changes Cc Mark I assume that Peter or someone in Canada is going to take care of the ERMT Canada name change I would suggest NETCO Canada Corp as we are planning on calling LLC NETCO Holdings LLC and ERMT Corp The New Energy Trading Company Just let me know Thanks Also where do you want to put new Wrapco underneath ENA or ENE or RMT for that matter NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you

RE EIN Numbers Cc legal Please check with Mark Taylor or the tax guys but if at all possible we would like to have a separate EIN for the LLC dont know if you always have the same EIN as parent in LLC but in our instance the LLC is now owned by RMT and owned by ENA We need to keep this entity separate from its parent entities to the extent possible on PM cc Subject RE EIN Numbers The EIN for ERMT LLC will be which is the same as its parent company Risk Management Trading Corp Deb Deb Korkmas Enron North America Corp Smith Street ECN A Houston TX Phone Fax Original Message From ENRON Sent Thursday November AM To Korkmas Deb Cc Subject EIN Numbers Deb do you know if we have obtained EIN numbers for both ERMT LLC and ERMT Corp I assume since we got a bank account we have one for Corp but didnt know about LLC I also assume that the Canadian counsel have received the proper tax ID or other info for ERMT Canada Corp Also fyi we will be changing the names of the US entities today to NETCO Holdings LLC and The New Energy Trading Company I will check with Mark Taylor on the Canadian name change Thanks NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the ERMT Name Changes Cc Please find attached for execution are the following documents necessary to change the names of ERMT LLC to NETCO Holdings Corp and ERMT Corp to The New Energy Trading Company Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation Written Consent of Stockholder of ERMT Corp approving same Written Consent of Board of ERMT Corp approving same Certificate of Amendment to Certificate of Formation of ERMT LLC We will probably amend the LLC agreement later and reflect the name change as well as anything else that comes up but these documents will allow us to file the name changes and have them effective today Please let me know when you are able to get these executed and I will have Ann work with NRA and get them filed this afternoon Thanks NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you Amended and Restated Charter of NETCO See attached file DOC Stockholder Consent of ERMT Corp AR Charter See attached file yDOC Board Consent of ERMT Corp AR Charter See attached file DOC Certificate of Amendment to Certificate of Formation ERMT LLC See attached file DOC DOC yDOC DOC DOC

swapco entities Cc Mark and Deb just for your information in the event that we would for any reason need to do any additional corporate filings for the swapco entities I just wanted to remind you guys that the Delaware secretary of states office is closed on Monday for Veterans Day I dont think we have anything else to file right now but just in case something different comes up over the weekend we wouldnt be able to file anything until Tuesday Thanks NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you

Re Swapco DocumentsHow many Class A Units should swapco issue for valuation question I know we had talked about million I was thinking that since we were getting an exclusive for certain uses now maybe we do million which would be a round number we issued units in exchange for million so million would be units Let me know what you think Thanks NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you

Re Swapco Documents Cc Attached is a revised services agreement with the fee schedule it just needs to be dated the draft line removed and then I had bracketed in the fee schedule the premium to be paid for employee services opportunity cost premium I have it set up so that overhead and outofpocket expenses are passed through at cost I will check with Anne and Roger Ross of our office on the license agreement I think it is almost done They provided a new posting license agreement to me this afternoon which I am still looking at The only corporate matter left to do is issue the golden share of ERMT LLC which based on this mornings version of the merger agreement wont be prohibited after we sign We have placed a couple of calls to our contact to provide someone to do this but have not heard back from them today so we will keep trying but that shouldnt be a pacing item at this point The only other thing on my list is a FERC license and after talking to Marcus this morning I dont think Clinton is going to be an option because the golden share as opposed to just an independent director will apparently cause us to have to do a change of control filing for that entity anyway NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you Administrative Services Agreement See attached file zDOC Administrative Services Agreement See attached file zRTFDOC zDOC zRTFDOC

RE Comments to Administrative Services AgreementI added the sentence on the fees to say something like at the request of or directed by ERMT I think this works because we should only owe fees to the extent of services provided that we request in the event we dont request any we shouldnt owe anything As far as the fee structure I would think it would need to be cost or costplus Obviously costplus looks better from an armslength basis on AM cc Subject RE Comments to Administrative Services Agreement Thanks Stuart Ill add it in Two other questions should the performance of the services be delayed until requested at a later date there isnt much need for it today and what do we do about the fees Original Message From ENRON Sent Tuesday November AM To Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE Comments to Administrative Services Agreement We can say the following Provision of office space which may include office space in the current principal offices of the Administrator or such other location in Houston Texas or other location as Adminstrator may occupy and such other office space as may be reasonably required by ERMT from time to time during the term of this Agreement Let me know if you want me to add this or if you are going to do it on your end Thanks on AM cc Subject RE Comments to Administrative Services Agreement One more thing we need to consider is office space Can I just add that in as a service Original Message From ENRON Sent Monday November PM To Taylor Mark E Legal Cc Subject Re Comments to Administrative Services Agreement Attached is a revised services agreement to reflect your comments you will note that I dont know the actual corporate name or form for Enron Net Works so that will need to confirmed Please let me know if you have any further thoughts or comments on the attached Thanks NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not Re Investment of ERMT Corp moneyI think that is fine the treasury group will just be acting at the direction of ERMT and thats ordinary course Of course the services agreement should take care of all of that in the future when we have it signed up We just might want to come up with an informal cash management agreement in the interim such that ERMT would compensate ENE a nominal amount for those services Also Baker Botts has agreed to limit the prohibition on issuance of subsidiary stock to Significant Subsidiaries within the meaning of SX which I believe that swapco clearly would not be given the size of Enron So we should be OK on that front NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you

Re Capital Contribution documentationOnce the agreement is signed it would prohibit us from issuing the golden share as well as the shares to ENA for enron online unless we put that on the disclosure schedule However since I dont know that we can get a golden shareholder today we should probably consider putting this on the disclosure schedule to the merger agreement Is it problematic for you to disclose this to the other side If so we might be able to have the golden interest issued to an individual who can later transfer them to a coporate shareholder Let me know what you think Taylor Mark E Legal Mark NRONcom on PM cc Subject Capital Contribution documentation Under normal circumstances we would not need an Enron Corp resolution and in fact the Corporate Secretary and Treasury offices can handle moving the money around so we do not propose to do an Enron Corp Board action unless you folks think it is absolutely necessary The other resolutions we can get in place easily I think Notre Dame agreement contains restrictions on what we can do with capital stock of subsidiaries after it is signed does that mean we need to issue the Golden Share today Mark Taylor Vice President and Re Legal Support for SwapcoThis has been a challenge for us in other deals in a recent transaction that Mary and I worked on we had to limit the types of legal services to be provided to ministerialinformation gathering for fear of losing privilege I need to think about this and talk to a couple people to see if we can come up with a workable solution so Ill get back to you on this Taylor Mark E Legal Mark NRONcom on PM cc Subject Legal Support for Swapco Any thoughts on how we provide legal support for Swapco Should that be covered by the Services Agreement Can lawyers who work for ENA represent Swapco without a conflict Mark Taylor Vice President and General Counsel Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EB Houston Texas fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you

swapco structure Cc legal I am attaching a structure chart showing what we think would be the best alternative for the swapco transaction if necessary This structure would require ESVL Corp to obtain a FERC Power Marketing Certificate and would be the actual operating entity We are also indifferent if instead of the corporation we use another LLC as the operating company below ERMT LLC Let me know when you will be available this afternoon to discuss the attached and the required documentation It is in Visio format so if you cant open it let me know and I can fax it to you if you give me a confidential fax number Thanks NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you Swapco Structure Chart See attached file zlVSD zlVSD
